description.value:
The alchemistâ€™s unique dyes allow him to create images accompanied by sound. If he expends an additional daily use of his bombs, the image he creates with the divine inks discovery also produces minor sounds, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{Minor Image}.

The alchemist must be at least 4th level and must have the divine inks discovery before selecting this discovery.
